channel.title: Game Development on Sam's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Game Development on Sam's Journey

item.title: 3D Gorillas
item.description: 3D Gorillas is a game developed by myself as part of my 3rd year dissertation project at the University of Hull. QBasic Gorillas is a 2D artillery game developed in 1992 by IBM corporation, and now we have the unofficial remake - 3D Gorillas, developed in Unity Engine by Sam Chestney in 2019! :)

item.title: Quadrant
item.description:
Introduction

Quadrant is the first game development project during my time studying Games Development at the University of Hull.
